occursOn(int, int, int) - Method in class assignment1.Action.sec311.RareAction

occursOn(int, int, int) - Method in class assignment1.Action.sec311.RegularAction
occursOn have no conditions and will always return true as Regular Actions are performed daily or regardless of date entered.
